CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper November 21, 1959, pg. 7, reads: "Mayor Presents Citations - Mayor Thomas T. Gallagher presents a citation to Fifth Avenue High School students in observation of the National Urban League's 'Equal Opportunity Day.' Left to right: Robert Willison, Urban League President; the Mayor, Thomas Burns, Urban League official; LaVerne Green, who accepted the citation; Henry Pearson, past president of the Urban League, and Paul Patton, who was cited, too. The two students were honored Tuesday for outstanding scholastic achievements. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Urban League president Robert Willison, Pittsburgh Mayor Thomas J. Gallagher presenting citation to Fifth Avenue High School student LaVerne Green, with Thomas Burns between them, Henry Pearson, and Fifth Avenue student Paul Patton gathered in Office of the Mayor at City County Building
